text: sahou eb ban pol tha ao krom robsakhnhom. tae puok anak yl kheunh yeangna brasenbae khnhom mean phosdo tang chbasaleasa pi mcheasa robsakhnhom haey trong ban phdal aoy khnhom nouv leaphosakkar da brasaer pi trong haey noh? haey khnhom ka min chng brachheang nung puok anak champoh avei del khnhom hamkhat dl puok anak ampi vea noh der . khnhom kmean bamnng avei krawpi karosamrob samruol tam avei del khnhom ach thveu ban noh laey . haey kmean karnena robsa khnhom te leuklengte mk pi a l laoh bonnaoh . champoh trong del khnhom ban brakl kar touk chetd haey khnhom nung vilotralb towkean trong vinh
